title: Tata Motors sales dip 8% to 71,693 units in August
description: Tata Motors reported an 8 per cent increase in total wholesales for August, with 71,693 units compared to 78,010 units in the same month last year. Domestic sales, however, dipped by 8 per cent, hitting 70,006 units. Passenger vehicle sales, including electric vehicles, reached 44,142 units, while commercial vehicle sales declined 3 per cent to 25,864 units.
